title: JESUS CHRIST IS GOD'S ONLY PROVISION FOR OUR SIN. THROUGH HIM ALONE WE CAN KNOW GOD PERSONALLY AND EXPERIENCE GOD'S LOVE AND PLAN.
content1: God demonstrates His own love for us, in that while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us." (1 Corinthians 15:3-6)
content2: Christ died for our sins…He was buried…He was raised on the third day, according to the Scriptures…He appeared to Peter, then to the Twelve.  After that He appeared to more than five hundred…  (1 Corinthians 15:3-6)
content3: Christ died for our sins…He was buried…He was raised on the third day, according to the Scriptures…He appeared to Peter, then to the Twelve.  After that He appeared to more than five hundred…  (1 Corinthians 15:3-6)
